findings.message:
Reentrancy in Boardroom.stake(address,uint256) (../..0xacbdb82f07b2653137d3a08a22637121422ae747.sol#1135-1147):
	External calls:
	- _doStakeTransfer(msg.sender,to,amount) (../..0xacbdb82f07b2653137d3a08a22637121422ae747.sol#1145)
		- stakingToken.transferFrom(from,address(this),amount) (../..0xacbdb82f07b2653137d3a08a22637121422ae747.sol#1171)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Staked(msg.sender,to,amount) (../..0xacbdb82f07b2653137d3a08a22637121422ae747.sol#1146)
findings.name: reentrancy-events

findings.message:
Reentrancy in Boardroom.withdraw(address,uint256) (../..0xacbdb82f07b2653137d3a08a22637121422ae747.sol#1152-1161):
	External calls:
	- _doWithdrawTransfer(msg.sender,to,amount) (../..0xacbdb82f07b2653137d3a08a22637121422ae747.sol#1159)
		- stakingToken.transfer(to,amount) (../..0xacbdb82f07b2653137d3a08a22637121422ae747.sol#1182)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Withdrawn(msg.sender,to,amount) (../..0xacbdb82f07b2653137d3a08a22637121422ae747.sol#1160)
findings.name: reentrancy-events

findings.message:
Reentrancy in Boardroom._claimReward(address,address) (../..0xacbdb82f07b2653137d3a08a22637121422ae747.sol#1279-1290):
	External calls:
	- token.transfer(to,reward) (../..0xacbdb82f07b2653137d3a08a22637121422ae747.sol#1287)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- RewardPaid(syntheticTokenAddress,msg.sender,to,reward) (../..0xacbdb82f07b2653137d3a08a22637121422ae747.sol#1288)
findings.name: reentrancy-events
